info.name: EMetricSuieAPI
info.description:
## EMetric Suite Backend API

- **Version**: 1.0.0

This is a private API for the EMetricSuite Application.  
The EMetricSuiteAPI contains a series of endpoints that allows you intergrate with the product and shows how the necessary parts of the product.

item.name: Tenant

request.description: Login a user to emetric suite
This is a protected endpoint, to log a given user out, if the logout resource returns a 4xx, delete tokens locally from the client.
Validate an email that registers with Emetric suite, s the account can be able to log in and use other services in the application.

item.description:
These resources are resource pertaining to tenants.

Tenants here signify organisation created.

The URLs must have a /client/ before the actual URI's

request.description: Create a new service account as someone who has the intention to register an organisation on EMetricSuite
Validate an email that registers with Emetric suite, s the account can be able to log in and use other services in the application.
Login a user to emetric suite
This is a protected endpoint, to log a given user out, if the logout resource returns a 4xx, delete tokens locally from the client.

request.description:
Get all organisations on our platform, this is a super admin account on EMetricSuite.
This is a paginated response that returns 10 result per page.
You can modify these by passing `page` and `page_size` as query params

Get all organisations on our platform, this is an admin account on the service account page.

You can modify these by passing `page` and `page_size` as query params

Create the company's organisation structure, it is a protected endpoint, and also make sure the organisation is already setup. this is creating a structre in the organisation that has been setup, you can do this in multiple organisation you have setup.  

This resource is only avaiable with the service account and it is not tenant specific
